column5: That's gotta go on a wall in your home!

Sick photo Simon!!!  Its not often lac seul is glass!  Was this yesterday? Talk about a nice day hey bud? +21 here and not a lick of wind  Supposed to be warmer today even.  Im heading out soon for a fish
Beautiful...if only the lake had good fishing eh??

Thanks guys!      Yeah, fishing sucks there, no walleye at all, sometimes get a few dink perch, that's about it.      Sick photo Simon!!!Its not often lac seul is glass!Was this yesterday? Talk about a nice day hey bud? +21 here and not a lick of windSupposed to be warmer today even.Im heading out soon for a fish   Yeah, weather has been crazy warm, I was in my T-shirt all afternoon, even when the boat was moving. That was yesterday afternoon, like you said today is even warmer! Tbay was apparently +25C yesterday!!!!  Was an awesome afternoon out on 'Secret Island' as Jack calls it. We cooked smokies on an open fire, went exploring, hid a geocache there, shot tin cans with a BB gun, spent an hour in the boat and got 3 grouse on the way out.

Ok bud! Now thats a wicked way to spend the day!  Hows the birds up your way this year?  Very thick this way. Limits all 4 outings and quick! Bray is out with his buddy shooting birds right now.  I hope he gets a limit to go with todays fish we caught!  Jack sure has awesome parental units!!! Growin up ol school that boy!
Nice pix of a great day outdoors!  Shortage of walleye - I think you're spoofing us??
beauty shot, and what a great looking day on the lake!

Ok bud! Now thats a wicked way to spend the day!  Hows the birds up your way this year?  Very thick this way. Limits all 4 outings and quick! Bray is out with his buddy shooting birds right now.  I hope he gets a limit to go with todays fish we caught!  Jack sure has awesome parental units!!! Growin up ol school that boy!  LOL@"parental Units"  Birds are thick out here too, I have limited out a couple times, but i'm just hunting the road in and out of Lac Seul, depends on the traffic.    Nice pix of a great day outdoors! Shortage of walleye - I think you're spoofing us??  Yessireeeâ€¦.spoofin' ya!    beauty shot, and what a great looking day on the lake!   Thanks Rick, you up next year?
That's a beauty pic Simon! Thanks for sharing! HH
Banner that in the rec room Simon!  With some fish mounts.
Nice pic!!! Another lake I want to fish :-)
